Title: Relates to the requirements of the annual report from the division of minority and women's business development
Summary: Relates to the requirements of the annual report from the division of minority and women's business development; requires the number of new certifications and recertifications including the basis for any denials be included in the annual report from the division of minority and women's business development.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to requirements of the annual report from the division of minority and women's business development
